EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: ASIAN INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT BANK AGREEMENT ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Privileges and Immunities of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to section 4 of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank Agreement Acta, makes the annexed Privileges and Immunities of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank Order.

Section.Text: The following privileges and immunities, as set out in Chapter IX of the Agreement, are granted to the Bank:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the full juridical personality and full legal capacity, as set out in Article 45 of the Agreement;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the immunity from every form of legal process, as set out in Article 46 of the Agreement;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the immunity of its property and assets and the inviolability of its archives and documents, as set out in Article 47 of the Agreement;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: the freedom from restrictions, regulations, controls and moratoria of all property and assets to the extent set out in Article 48 of the Agreement;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: the same treatment accorded to its official communications as is accorded to the official communications of any other member, as set out in Article 49 of the Agreement;

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: the immunities and privileges of its officers and employees, as set out in Article 50 of the Agreement; and

Paragraph.Label: (g)
Paragraph.Text: the exemption from taxation, as set out in Article 51 of the Agreement.

Section.Text: This Order comes into force on the day on which it is registered.
